entry.dcterms:subject: TDATA-B06
TDATA-B75

The 1986 (Social Networks) and the 1987 (Social Inequality I) ISSP modules have been conducted together with the 1989 ISSP module on ‘Work Orientations' (ZA No. 1840). The Irish data for the 1989 ISSP module are in the international file. ZA Study no.: 1
SPSS portable datafile
